text: Amadou Dia N'Diaye (born 2 January 2000) is a Senegalese professional footballer who plays as a striker for FC Sochaux-Montbéliard, on loan from Metz. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Senegal's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" !
